titles.title: Tobacco Advertising Reform and Revenue Enhancement Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow the deduction for advertising or other promotion expenses with respect to sales of tobacco products.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1128)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/4/1993--Introduced. Tobacco Advertising Reform and Revenue Enhancement Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow any deduction for tobacco product sale promotion expenses.
